item.description:
I have an 11:30am Tee Time at Billerica Country Club on Sunday, 5/3/09.

I will plan to play 18 holes....though I think I will use a motorized cart.

18 holes costs $51 per person....with the motorized cart.

PEOPLE ARE STILL WELCOME TO CARRY OR PULL IF THEY WISH!

Please arrive at least 15 minutes in advance.

Address is:
51 Baldwin Road, Billerica, Massachusetts 01821
Phone: (978)667-9121

URL is

http://www.countryclu....

Thanks, Greg, Assistant Organizer

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Billerica Country Club
